message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the task of automatic sarcasm detection in text, which falls under the field of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses various machine learning approaches and techniques used for sarcasm detection, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of context and sentiment analysis, which could place it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
